metadata.author: Your Name
metadata.description: A collection of business quotes about trust and integrity

quotes.quote: Trust is the glue of life. It's the most essential ingredient in effective communication. It's the foundational principle that holds all relationships.
quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.quote: Integrity is doing the right thing, even when no one is watching.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: A brand is a promise delivered. Trust is earned when that promise is kept consistently.
quotes.author: Howard Schultz

quotes.quote: Real integrity is doing the right thing, knowing that nobody's going to know whether you did it or not.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Trust is built with consistency.
quotes.author: Lincoln Chafee

quotes.quote: Integrity is choosing your thoughts and actions based on values rather than personal gain.
quotes.author: Chris Karcher

quotes.quote: The currency of real networking is not greed but generosity.
quotes.author: Keith Ferrazzi

quotes.quote: Good business leaders create a vision, articulate the vision, passionately own the vision, and relentlessly drive it to completion.
quotes.author: Jack Welch

quotes.quote: Trust is the highest form of human motivation. It brings out the very best in people.
quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.quote: In the end, all you have is your reputation.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Trust is built when someone is vulnerable and not taken advantage of.
quotes.author: Bob Vanourek

quotes.quote: Ethics is knowing the difference between what you have a right to do and what is right to do.
quotes.author: Potter Stewart

quotes.quote: A business that makes nothing but money is a poor business.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Trust starts with trustworthy leadership. It must be built into the corporate culture.
quotes.author: Barbara Brooks Kimmel

quotes.quote: Who you are speaks so loudly I can't hear what you're saying.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Trust is like the air we breathe - when it's present, nobody really notices; when it's absent, everybody notices.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: The strength of a nation derives from the integrity of the home.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Trust is the easiest thing in the world to lose, and the hardest thing in the world to get back.
quotes.author: R. Williams

quotes.quote: Integrity without knowledge is weak and useless, and knowledge without integrity is dangerous and dreadful.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Trust takes years to build, seconds to break, and forever to repair.
quotes.author: Unknown
